title: uhhh help?
body:
https://imgur.com/a/7Ai5B

Whats up with my update?

replies.body:
Ahhhh that can happen sometimes if your connection goes dormant during that process. If that happens, the progress bar can sometimes continue loading until it's at like 110%/100% which is preeeeetty awkward tbh.

Usually, it'll clear itself up and finally load the actual patcher, but if you've been looking at that for awhile I'd go ahead and close it. Double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) or switch to an ethernet cable during the patch to make sure it downloads without errors ^_^!
